>me to track down? For example, when you try to load a level, do you get:
>        * "Invalid level" message

>        * or what?

Occasionally when I try to load a level that doesnt exist...I get "invalid
level" ...well....not when I try to load it, but when I try to "set level"
it will say that....usually if I mess up it just takes me to level 0 ...the
"register" level....But...Ive made about 20 levels so far and havnt had a
problem at all aside from me forgetting something silly....
